body:
The color from the top of the table is #E6E8EA.

The colors from the bottom of the table are #E2E6EA (top part of the gradient) to #C0C4C9 (bottom part of the gradient). I hope the color match is close enough.

The following tool may help you next time: http://html-color-codes.info/colors-from-image/
title: Html match color
